scripts.bootstrap:cra: pnpm --package vercel -c dlx 'vercel link apps/cra && vercel env pull apps/cra/.env.local'
scripts.bootstrap:next: pnpm --package vercel -c dlx 'vercel link apps/next && vercel env pull apps/next/.env.local'
scripts.bootstrap:remix: pnpm --package vercel -c dlx 'vercel link apps/remix && vercel env pull apps/remix/.env.local'
scripts.bootstrap:studio: pnpm --package vercel -c dlx 'vercel link apps/studio && vercel env pull apps/studio/.env.local'
